channel.title: 7. Numbers on WY Computer Science
channel.description: Recent content in 7. Numbers on WY Computer Science

item.title: Exercises 1
item.description: Exercises: hypotenuse: Given two legs of a right triangle, return the length of the third side. slope: Given the x and y coordinates of two points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2) - in that order - return the slope of the line between those points. (OK if it does not work for vertical lines.) distance: Given the x and y coordinates of two points (x1,y1) and (x2,y2), find the distance between them.

item.title: Number Intro
item.description: Practice the design process making each of these functions: Write a function that takes in the radius of a circle and outputs the circumference. Write a function to find the cost of a cart full of g pounds of grapefruit and b pounds of bananas. The grapefruit costs $1.49/lb and the bananas cost $0.59/lb.
